text: "Starman" is a 1972 song by David Bowie and is the leading single from his fifth studio album The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders from Mars. Upon release, it received positive reviews and went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 65 in the United States and number 17 in Ireland. It was covered by the Culture Club in 1999. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:David Bowie songs Category:Culture Club songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Starman (song)
